text: N’Imana niyo yabaremye ibakuye mw’ivu, hanyuma kw’ima ry’intanga, hanyuma ibagirira abagabo n’abagore, n’umugore uwariwe wese ntashobora gusama imbanyi canke ntiyibaruka atari kubumenyi bw’Imana, nuwahawe ubuzima ntahabwa ubwo buzima bw’umurengero canke ntagaba nirizwa kuri ubwo buzima atari uko vyose biri mugitabu c’Imana gitagatifu, ntankeka ibi vyose biroroshe imbere y’Imana
